attributes.action: Ban the local trial of electric scooters!
attributes.additional_details: Inappropriate and dangerous use on pavements and public roads, obstructing traffic. More and more accidents involving e-scooters.
attributes.background: Ban the local trial of electric scooters, and fines for those using them.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors 

We could accept a petition calling for a ban on e-scooters overall.
